types_of_data_collected: Identity and Contact Data (name, email address, phone number, indirect identifiers like 'USER12345')
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (when signing up for an Anthropic account or to receive information)
data_usage: To provide, maintain and facilitate products and services with respect to the Anthropic account; To create and administer the Anthropic account; To communicate with the user, including to send information about Services and events; To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To investigate and resolve disputes/security issues; To enforce Terms of Service
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners (for website/data hosting, compliance, research, etc.); As part of a significant corporate event; Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

methods_of_collection: Directly from users (if choosing to purchase access to products and services)
data_usage: To facilitate payments for products and services; To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To enforce Terms of Service
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners (for website/data hosting, compliance, research, auditing, data processing, etc.); As part of a significant corporate event; Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

methods_of_collection: Directly from users (via interaction with Services, including third-party application integrations); May be collected to train models
data_usage: To provide, maintain, and facilitate products and services; To improve the Services and conduct research, including training models (unless the user opts out, except in cases of safety flagging or explicit reporting); To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To investigate and resolve security issues; To debug and repair errors; To enforce Terms of Service
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners; As part of a significant corporate event; Third-Party Websites and Services (via integrations/links, where the third party collects the data and not Anthropic); Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

types_of_data_collected: Feedback (ideas, suggestions, ratings, and the entire related conversation if rating an Output)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (by providing ideas, suggestions, or rating an Output); May be collected to train models
data_usage: To provide, maintain, and facilitate products and services; To improve the Services and conduct research, including training models; To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To investigate and resolve security issues; To debug and repair errors; To enforce Terms of Service
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners; As part of a significant corporate event; Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

types_of_data_collected: Communication Information (name, contact information, contents of messages)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (when communicating with Anthropic, e.g., via the chatbot on the Help site)
data_usage: To provide, maintain, and facilitate products and services; To communicate with the user; To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To investigate and resolve disputes/security issues; To enforce Terms of Service
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners; As part of a significant corporate event; Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

types_of_data_collected: Technical Information (Device and Connection Information, Usage Information, Log and Troubleshooting Information)
methods_of_collection: Automatically from user's use of the Services; Via Cookies & Similar Technologies
data_usage: To provide, maintain, and facilitate products and services; To provide optional services and features; To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations; To investigate and resolve security issues; To debug and repair errors; To improve the Services; To enforce Terms of Service; To recognize the user, customize experience, market additional products/services, and analyze use of Services (via Cookies)
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners; Service providers & business partners; As part of a significant corporate event; Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce rights/terms; With an individual's consent; Service providers (via Cookies)
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy

types_of_data_collected: Model Training Data (Publicly available information, Datasets from commercial agreements, User/crowd worker data, Feedback, Materials flagged for review, Internally generated data)
methods_of_collection: From third-party sources (Internet, commercial agreements); From users or crowd workers (including Inputs and Outputs, unless opt-out); From user Feedback; Internally generated
data_usage: To train models; To improve the Services and conduct research; Aggregated or de-identified forms used for analysis and training AI models; Flagged content used to train trust and safety internal models
third_party_disclosure: not specified (Source focuses on collection and internal use for training models)
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy
